posts.post_content:

Turn 1 win with a rod of ruin = extra style points.

posts.post_content: People keep saying the original combo used a mountain.... The original deck didn't have any lands. Twenty of Black lotus, Channel and Fireball. Then they could mulligan until they had a fireball, Channel and two black lotuses. There weren't any limits to the number of a single card you could play in a deck.
posts.html:

posts.post_content:
This card actually defined a Yu-Gi-Oh episode. Naturally, they made Ra even more broken.
  
   
You can do the same, if you have something like Channel/[Vault Skirge](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Vault Skirge)/[Distortion Strike](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Distortion Strike)/[Untamed Might](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Untamed Might). Crazy level of Johnny-ness, but theoretically doable. Throw on a [Curse of Bloodletting](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Curse of Bloodletting), double strike anything, [Inquisitor's Flail](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Inquisitor's Flail), or replace the Skirge with an infect guy for even more lulz.
posts.html:
This card actually defined a Yu-Gi-Oh episode. Naturally, they made Ra even more broken.

You can do the same, if you have something like Channel/Vault Skirge/Distortion Strike/Untamed Might. Crazy level of Johnny-ness, but theoretically doable. Throw on a Curse of Bloodletting, double strike anything, Inquisitor's Flail, or replace the Skirge with an infect guy for even more lulz.
